name: ugs
description: Universal Graph System - Graph database with event sourcing built on agentic-primer

scripts.test: source ~/.config/ai/config && export CF_ACCOUNT_ID CF_GATEWAY_NAME CF_AIG_TOKEN CLOUDFLARE_ACCOUNT_ID=$CF_ACCOUNT_ID CLOUDFLARE_GATEWAY_ID=$CF_GATEWAY_NAME CLOUDFLARE_API_TOKEN=$CF_AIG_TOKEN && bun test
scripts.test:integration: source ~/.config/ai/config && export CF_ACCOUNT_ID CF_GATEWAY_NAME CF_AIG_TOKEN CLOUDFLARE_ACCOUNT_ID=$CF_ACCOUNT_ID CLOUDFLARE_GATEWAY_ID=$CF_GATEWAY_NAME CLOUDFLARE_API_TOKEN=$CF_AIG_TOKEN RUN_SLOW_TESTS=1 && bun test src/session-knowledge/__tests__/*.integration.test.ts
scripts.test:perf: source ~/.config/ai/config && export CF_ACCOUNT_ID CF_GATEWAY_NAME CF_AIG_TOKEN CLOUDFLARE_ACCOUNT_ID=$CF_ACCOUNT_ID CLOUDFLARE_GATEWAY_ID=$CF_GATEWAY_NAME CLOUDFLARE_API_TOKEN=$CF_AIG_TOKEN RUN_SLOW_TESTS=1 && bun test src/session-knowledge/__tests__/*.perf.test.ts
scripts.test:e2e: source ~/.config/ai/config && export CF_ACCOUNT_ID CF_GATEWAY_NAME CF_AIG_TOKEN CLOUDFLARE_ACCOUNT_ID=$CF_ACCOUNT_ID CLOUDFLARE_GATEWAY_ID=$CF_GATEWAY_NAME CLOUDFLARE_API_TOKEN=$CF_AIG_TOKEN && bun test src/entities/*.e2e.test.ts

author: UGS Project
